file_content.text: CONTINUE
SUBSCRIBE
Welcome!

Welcome back to the exciting world of Star Wars™: The Old Republic™! Continue your adventure, make new friends, connect with former allies, and tackle your greatest challenges yet!
As a Subscriber you gain many benefits that Free-to-Play Players do not. You will keep all of these benefits as long as your subscription or Game Time Card is active!
SUBSCRIBER BENEFITS
A minimum of 500 Complimentary Cartel Coins per month to spend in the Cartel Market
Twelve character slots per server
Unlimited access to Warzones, Flashpoints, Space Missions and Operations
Access to all six quickbars
Priority position in server queues
Full access to your inventory and Cargo Hold
Create a fully-featured guild
Unrestricted access to chat
Expanded Species selection
Free skill point re-specialization
Increased experience and Valor gains
Access to all equipment, regardless of quality
Lower costs when removing item modifications or adding augment slots
Earlier access to Sprint and Speeder Piloting
Access to the Emergency Fleet Pass ability
Full access to learn three Crew Skills
Sell up to fifty items on the Galactic Trade Network
YOU ARE NOW A SUBSCRIBER!
You now have maximum access to game features and rewards! You will keep these benefits as long as your subscription or time card remains active.
Welcome!

Welcome and thank you for playing Star Wars: The Old Republic™! Explore the Galaxy, make friends and defeat some of the toughest enemies around.
As a Free-to-Play Player, you can experience your characters' full story to Level 50, make friends with other players and explore the Galaxy! You will gain even more benefits by becoming a Subscriber!
SUBSCRIBERS
A minimum of 500 Complimentary Cartel Coins per month to spend in the Cartel Market
Full access to your inventory and Cargo Hold
Create a fully-featured Guild
Access to a Guild Bank
Increased gains of Experience and Valor
Additional Sale Slots on the Galactic Trade Network
Full access to the innovative Crew Skill system
Sprint at level 1, earlier Speeder Piloting abilities
10 additional Character Slots per server
Access to all 6 quickbars
Unlimited access to Warzones, Flashpoints, Space Missions and Operations
FREE-TO-PLAY PLAYERS
No monthly Cartel Coin allotment
Inventory and Cargo Hold expansions require Cartel Coins
Lead a Free-to-Play Player Guild
Access 2 quickbars for abilities
Reduced gains of Experience and Valor points
Limited Sale Slots on the Galactic Trade Network
Two Crew Skill Slots, reduced advancement speed
Later access to Sprint and Speeder Piloting abilities
YOU ARE NOW PREFERRED STATUS!

Welcome back to the world of Star Wars™: The Old Republic™! Continue your adventure, meet new people, and tackle your greatest challenges yet!
You now have access to expanded features including an additional Crew Skill slot, Sprint at level 1 and more! Restrictions can be removed by becoming a Subscriber or through purchases from the Cartel Market.
YOU ARE NOW PREFERRED STATUS!

Welcome back to the world of Star Wars: The Old Republic™! Your account has changed from Subscriber to Preferred Status.
Because of the change in your account, there have potentially been changes to your character. Listed below are the restrictions and the actions you may have to take when logging into the game:
RESTRICTION
Limited to twelve Character Slots
Limited to four Quick Bars
Access to Flashpoints, Operations, Warzones and Galactic Command is now limited.
Credits now capped at 350,000
Cannot use Artifact quality equipment, Event items, Companion customizations.
Ineligible for Cartel Coin grants from being a Subscriber.
EFFECT
In the future, you will need to choose twelve Active Characters.
Additional Quick Bars are disabled. Purchased Quick Bars are still active.
You will need to re-subscribe to get unlimited gameplay access.
Credits in excess of the cap have been placed into Escrow
You have Authorization to wear bound items of these types. Authorization for all future items is available in the Cartel Market.
Only eligible for Cartel Coin grants for an active Security Key and Referrals.
Additional details can be found at: <hl lid="BFBF" >

Opened your web client and sending you to swtor.com.
If you change your subscription type, you will need to restart your client before seeing all of the changes.
FREE-TO-PLAY STATUS
Limited access to Warzones, Flashpoints, Space Missions, and Operations
You may not equip/wear all of your high-level items without an Authorization
Limited to twelve Character Slots
Limited Galactic Trade Network Auction Slots for Free-to-Play and Preferred Status
Credits capped for Free-to-Play and Preferred Status
You do not earn Complimentary Cartel Coin grants
SUBSCRIBER STATUS
Unlimited access to Warzones, Flashpoints, Space Missions and Operations
Access to equip/wear all game items
Up to twenty-four Characters per Server
Access to fifty Galactic Trade Network Auction Slots
No Credit Cap as a Subscriber
Receive a minimum grant of 500 Complimentary Cartel Coins per month!
PREFERRED STATUS
Limited access to Warzones, Flashpoints, Space Missions and Operations
You may not equip/wear all of your high-level items without an Authorization
Limited to twelve Character Slots
Limited to five Galactic Trade Network Auction Slots
Credits now capped at 350,000
You do not earn Complimentary Cartel Coin grants
